body_html:
Note that even with this change test_distributions.py doesn't pass with WITH_SCALARS enabled; it seems like there are indexing bugs exposed by the distributions module (thanks!) that we need to fix (I'm looking at it). So errors like:

RuntimeError: too many indices for tensor of dimension 0 (got 1)

are okay for now.
body_text:
Note that even with this change test_distributions.py doesn't pass with WITH_SCALARS enabled; it seems like there are indexing bugs exposed by the distributions module (thanks!) that we need to fix (I'm looking at it).  So errors like:

are okay for now.
body:
Note that even with this change `test_distributions.py` doesn't pass with `WITH_SCALARS` enabled; it seems like there are indexing bugs exposed by the distributions module (thanks!) that we need to fix (I'm looking at it).  So errors like:
```
RuntimeError: too many indices for tensor of dimension 0 (got 1)
```

are okay for now.
